physical_appearance: This blue white stem cup has its exterior body painted in rich cobalt blue. This background was executed in the signature 17th century cracked ice pattern, whose asymmetry visually contrasts against the curves of the plum blossoms. The lower rim of the stem is decorated with a jagged teeth  pattern.
sgcool_label_text: The stemcup is decorated with plum blossoms against a blue background filled with the cracked ice pattern (???). The cracked-ice pattern gained popularity as a decorative motif in seventeenth-century China and was appreciated for its beautiful asymmetry. On porcelain vessels, the pattern is often coupled with the plum blossom, which was regarded as a symbol of strength and endurance since the flower blooms in late winter or early spring.is decora
